title: SHORT TERM Studio in Chelsea Sloane Av
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Bright and comfortable furnished small studio flat in beautiful Sloane Avenue in Chelsea. A 5 min walking distance to South Kensington tube station and Sloane Square Tube station is a 10 mins walk away. It has a sofa/double bed, closet and drawers, hardwood floors, TV with basic cable, high speed Wi-Fi connection, fully equipped new kitchenette and microwave, washing machine and bathroom. It includes bedding and towels. Nice and open view. 6th floor, the building has 6 elevators. There is a Local Sainsbury's supermarket across the street. 3 mins walk to Kings Road with its boutiques, restaurants, shops and galleries at your doorstep. The studio flat is available from 20 February to 1 October 2021.

IMPORTANT note: One month rental period minimum. One month deposit is required. No agent or hidden fees.

The price is £1,600 per month, all utility bills, cable+ high speed wifi, council tax and central heating is included. Note: I am keeping some of my clothes and personal items in the studio.
